attributes.action: Open zoos prior to the 12th April
attributes.additional_details: Because zoos help with education and conservation; they are also a safe haven for many adults and children who have missed out on so much over the last year. Allowing zoos to open in a safe way will provide a much needed outlet for families and individuals alike, and help the zoos survive. The cost to them for not being open over the Easter holidays is devastating.
attributes.background: Allow zoos to open before the 12th April so they dont lose their Easter revenue. I'm local to Whipsnade & throughout the pandemic they've had strict social distancing procedures in place & visitors have only been able to use outdoor facilities. With these measures in place, they are safe places.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Open all zoos from 8th March 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576999

Open zoos up alongside outside sports and activities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576514

Allow zoos and safari parks to open with social distancing measures in place: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572139
